query.paramquery: PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> SELECT ?type ?country ?genus ?species WHERE { $speciesID a :Species . $speciesID :genus ?genus . $speciesID :species ?species . $speciesID :hasCommonName ?nameID . $nameID a :CommonName . $nameID :speciesCommonName "%comname%"^^xsd:string . $nameID :nameLanguageType ?type . $nameID :belongsToCountry ?countryID . $countryID a :Country . $countryID :countryName ?country . }

parameter.paramvaluesquery: PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> SELECT ?comname WHERE { $nameID a :CommonName . $nameID :nameLanguage "english"^^xsd:string . $nameID :speciesCommonName ?comname . }

query.paramquery: PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> select ?SpecCode ?Author ?FBname ?SpeciesRef ?author ?year ?comments ?family ?order ?class ?PictureName ?Photographer ?picID ?Entered ?demersPelag ?AnaCat ?description where { $p a :Picture . $p :pictureName ?PictureName . $p :author ?Photographer . $p :pictureID ?picID . $p :entered ?Entered . $p :isPictureOf ?id . $id a :Species . $id :speciesID ?SpecCode . $id :species "%species%"^^xsd:string . $id :genus "%genus%"^^xsd:string . $id :author ?Author . $id :FBname ?FBname . $id :comments ?comments . $id :speciesReferenceNo ?SpeciesRef . $id :belongsToFamily ?f . $id :hasSpeciesReference ?y . $y a :Reference . $y :author ?author . $y :year ?year . $f a :Family . $f :familyName ?family . $f :familyOrder ?order . $f :class ?class . $id :demersPelag ?demersPelag . $id :anaCat ?AnaCat . $id :hasMorphology ?m . $id :pictureName ?picPreferredName . $m a :Morphology . $m :addChars ?description . }

parameter.paramvaluesquery: PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> select ?species ?genus where { $id a :Species . $id :species ?species . $id :genus ?genus . }

query.paramquery: PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> SELECT ?species ?Author ?family WHERE { $x a :Species . $x :genus "%genus%"^^xsd:string . $x :species ?species . $x :author ?Author . $x :belongsToFamily ?y . $y a :Family . $y :familyName ?family . }

parameter.paramvaluesquery: PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> select ?genus where { $id a :Species . $id :genus ?genus . }

query.paramquery: PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> SELECT ?genus ?Author ?family WHERE { $x a :Species . $x :genus ?genus . $x :species "%species%"^^xsd:string . $x :author ?Author . $x :belongsToFamily ?f . $f a :Family . $f :familyName ?family . }

parameter.paramvaluesquery: PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> select ?species where { $id a :Species . $id :species ?species . }

query.paramquery: PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> SELECT ?Order ?Class ?Genera ?Species ?SpeciesNo ?Marine ?Freshwater ?Brackish ?Aquarium ?Remark ?Division ?ActivityLevel ?ReproductiveGuild ?author ?year WHERE { $x a :Family . $x :familyName "%family%"^^xsd:string . $x :familyOrder ?Order . $x :class ?Class . $x :noOfGenera ?Genera . $x :noOfSpecies ?Species . $x :totalNoOfSpecies ?SpeciesNo . $x :inSaltwater ?Marine . $x :inFreshwater ?Freshwater . $x :inBrackish ?Brackish . $x :aquarium ?Aquarium . $x :remark ?Remark . $x :division ?Division . $x :activityLevel ?ActivityLevel . $x :reproductiveGuild ?ReproductiveGuild . $x :hasReference ?y . $y a :Reference . $y :author ?author . $y :year ?year . }

parameter.paramvaluesquery: PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> SELECT ?family WHERE { $x a :Family . $x :familyName ?family . }

query.paramquery: PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> SELECT ?Genus ?Species ?author WHERE { $x a :Species . $x :genus ?Genus . $x :species ?Species . $x :author ?author . $x :belongsToFamily ?f . $f a :Family . $f :familyName "%family%"^^xsd:string . }

parameter.paramvaluesquery: PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> SELECT ?family WHERE { $x a :Family . $x :familyName ?family . }

query.paramquery: PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> SELECT ?Genus ?Species ?Author WHERE { $x a :Species . $x :genus ?Genus . $x :species ?Species . $x :author ?Author . $x :belongsToFamily ?f . $f :familyName "%family%"^^xsd:string . }

parameter.paramvaluesquery: PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> SELECT ?family WHERE { $x a :Family . $x :familyName ?family . }

query.paramquery: PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> SELECT ?Genus ?Species ?PictureName ?Photographer WHERE { $y a :Picture . $y :pictureName ?PictureName . $y :author ?Photographer . $y :isPictureOf ?x . $x a :Species . $x :genus ?Genus . $x :species ?Species . $x :belongsToFamily ?f . $f a :Family . $f :familyName "%family%"^^xsd:string . }

parameter.paramvaluesquery: PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> SELECT ?family WHERE { $x a :Family . $x :familyName ?family . }

query.paramquery: PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?prename ?surname ?email ?photo ?webpage ?fax ?institute ?street ?city ?country ?comments ?keywords ?year WHERE { $x a :Collaborator . $x :prename ?prename . $x :surname ?surname . $x :email ?email . $x :staffPhoto ?photo . $x :webpage ?webpage . $x :fax ?fax . $x :institute ?institute . $x :street ?street . $x :city ?city . $x :countryName ?country . $x :comments ?comments . $x :keywords ?keywords . $x :year ?year . $x :collaboratorID "%code%"^^xsd:integer . }

parameter.paramvaluesquery: PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?code WHERE { $x a :Collaborator . $x :collaboratorID ?code . }

query.paramquery: PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?genus ?species ?photographer ?stage WHERE { $id a :Picture . $id :pictureName "%picture%"^^xsd:string . $id :author ?photographer . $id :lifeStage ?stage . $id :isPictureOf ?x . $x a :Species . $x :genus ?genus . $x :species ?species . }

parameter.paramvaluesquery: PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?picture WHERE { $id a :Picture . $id :pictureName ?picture . }

query.paramquery: PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?order ?family ?genus ?species ?occurrence WHERE { $x a :Species . $x :genus ?genus . $x :species ?species . $x :isFoundInCountry ?c . $x :belongsToFamily ?f . $f a :Family . $f :familyName ?family . $f :familyOrder ?order . $countryID :countryName "%country%"^^xsd:string . $countryID :refersToCountry ?c . $c :status ?occurrence . }

PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?freshwater ?marine ?brackish ?occurrence ?Factbook WHERE { $x a :Species . $x :genus "%genus%"^^xsd:string . $x :species "%species%"^^xsd:string . $x :isFoundInCountry ?id . $countryID :countryName "%country%"^^xsd:string . $countryID :factbook ?Factbook . $countryID :refersToCountry ?id . $id :status ?occurrence . $id :inFreshwater ?freshwater . $id :inBrackish ?brackish . $id :inSaltwater ?marine . }

parameter.paramvaluesquery: PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> select ?species ?genus where { $id a :Species . $id :species ?species . $id :genus ?genus . }

query.paramquery: PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?order ?family ?genus ?species ?occurrence ?name WHERE { $speciesID a :Species . $speciesID :genus ?genus . $speciesID :species ?species . $speciesID :isFoundInCountry ?c . $speciesID :hasCommonName ?nameID . $speciesID :belongsToFamily ?f . $f a :Family . $f :familyName ?family . $f :familyOrder ?order . $nameID a :CommonName . $nameID :speciesCommonName ?name . $countryID :countryName "%country%"^^xsd:string . $countryID :refersToCountry ?c . $c :status ?occurrence . $c :inFreshwater "1"^^xsd:int . }

PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?order ?family ?genus ?species ?name WHERE { $speciesID a :Species . $speciesID :genus ?genus . $speciesID :species ?species . $speciesID :isFoundInCountry ?c . $speciesID :hasCommonName ?nameID . $speciesID :belongsToFamily ?f . $f a :Family . $f :familyName ?family . $f :familyOrder ?order . $nameID a :CommonName . $nameID :speciesCommonName ?name . $countryID :countryName "%country%"^^xsd:string . $countryID :refersToCountry ?c . $c :status "introduced"^^xsd:string . }

PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?order ?family ?genus ?species ?name WHERE { $speciesID a :Species . $speciesID :genus ?genus . $speciesID :species ?species . $speciesID :isFoundInCountry ?c . $speciesID :hasCommonName ?nameID . $speciesID :belongsToFamily ?f . $f a :Family . $f :familyName ?family . $f :familyOrder ?order . $nameID a :CommonName . $nameID :speciesCommonName ?name . $countryID :countryName "%country%"^^xsd:string . $countryID :refersToCountry ?c . $c :status "endemic"^^xsd:string . }

PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?order ?family ?genus ?species ?name ?occurrence ?dangerous WHERE { $speciesID a :Species . $speciesID :genus ?genus . $speciesID :species ?species . $speciesID :isDangerous ?dangerous . $speciesID :demersPelag "reef-associated"^^xsd:string . $speciesID :isFoundInCountry ?c . $speciesID :hasCommonName ?nameID . $speciesID :belongsToFamily ?f . $f a :Family . $f :familyName ?family . $f :familyOrder ?order . $nameID a :CommonName . $nameID :speciesCommonName ?name . $countryID :countryName "%country%"^^xsd:string . $countryID :refersToCountry ?c . $c :status ?occurrence . }

PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?order ?family ?genus ?species ?name ?occurrence ?dangerous WHERE { $speciesID a :Species . $speciesID :genus ?genus . $speciesID :species ?species . $speciesID :isDangerous ?dangerous . $speciesID :demersPelag "pelagic"^^xsd:string . $speciesID :isFoundInCountry ?c . $speciesID :hasCommonName ?nameID . $speciesID :belongsToFamily ?f . $f a :Family . $f :familyName ?family . $f :familyOrder ?order . $nameID a :CommonName . $nameID :speciesCommonName ?name . $countryID :countryName "%country%"^^xsd:string . $countryID :refersToCountry ?c . $c :status ?occurrence . }

PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?order ?family ?genus ?species ?name ?occurrence ?gameFish ?gameFishRef WHERE { $speciesID a :Species . $speciesID :genus ?genus . $speciesID :species ?species . $speciesID :gameFish ?gameFish . $speciesID :gameFishRef ?gameFishRef . $speciesID :isFoundInCountry ?c . $speciesID :hasCommonName ?nameID . $speciesID :belongsToFamily ?f . $f a :Family . $f :familyName ?family . $f :familyOrder ?order . $nameID a :CommonName . $nameID :speciesCommonName ?name . $countryID :countryName "%country%"^^xsd:string . $countryID :refersToCountry ?c . $c :status ?occurrence . $c :gameFish "1"^^xsd:integer . }

PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?order ?family ?genus ?species ?name ?occurrence WHERE { $speciesID a :Species . $speciesID :genus ?genus . $speciesID :species ?species . $speciesID :isFoundInCountry ?c . $speciesID :hasCommonName ?nameID . $speciesID :belongsToFamily ?f . $f a :Family . $f :familyName ?family . $f :familyOrder ?order . $nameID a :CommonName . $nameID :speciesCommonName ?name . $countryID :countryName "%country%"^^xsd:string . $countryID :refersToCountry ?c . $c :status ?occurrence . $c :importance "minor commercial"^^xsd:string . }

PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?genus ?species ?occurrence ?speciesAquaculture WHERE { $x a :Species . $x :genus ?genus . $x :species ?species . $x :usedForAquaculture ?speciesAquaculture . $x :isFoundInCountry ?c . $countryID :countryName "%country%"^^xsd:string . $countryID :refersToCountry ?c . $c :status ?occurrence . $c :aquaculture "commercial"^^xsd:string . }

PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?genus ?species ?occurrence ?countryAquaculture WHERE { $x a :Species . $x :genus ?genus . $x :species ?species . $x :usedForAquaculture "commercial"^^xsd:string . $x :isFoundInCountry ?c . $countryID :countryName "%country%"^^xsd:string . $countryID :refersToCountry ?c . $c :status ?occurrence . $c :aquaculture ?countryAquaculture . }

PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2012/4/fishdelish.owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?genus ?species ?occurrence ?aquarium WHERE { $x a :Species . $x :genus ?genus . $x :species ?species . $x :aquarium ?aquarium . $x :isFoundInCountry ?c . $countryID :countryName "%country%"^^xsd:string . $countryID :refersToCountry ?c . $c :status ?occurrence . $c :liveExport "ornamental"^^xsd:string . }
